name: Part 4: None
description:
A Twine game about watching paint dry, waiting for water to boil, and watching grass grow. 

This is part 4 of 5 in a series of games I've made over the last 2 weeks. If you are interested to see the rest of the published ones, please check out Parts 1, 2 and 5 (in progress).

#QRMJam 2018.
